showScoreExcerpt:
arrives on Broadway with its terrific cast and quirkiness intact. What’s best about this musical remains – above all, the slowly unfolding oddball relationship between two high school misfits, and the wonderful performances by the actors who portray them…the musical might have benefited from paring the various subplots…add up all these moments and they threaten to overwhelm or at least distract from the heart of “Kimberly Akimbo” — Kimberly and Seth.
